title: Push notification detail
description: Push notification detail required to send mobile push notification to a specific mobile application on a given device.

token.title: Push Token
token.description: Valid push token for the given push platform.

platform.title: Push Platform
platform.description: Push provider, e.g. apns or fcm

blacklisted.title: Blacklist Flag
blacklisted.description: Indicates whether the push token is blacklisted. Deprecated due to new guidance on key names, use blocklisted instead.

blocklisted.title: Blocklist Flag
blocklisted.description: Indicates whether the push token is blocked by the push provider. Deprecated due to new guidance on key names, use denylisted instead.

denylisted.title: Denylist Flag
denylisted.description: Indicates whether the push token is blocked by the push provider.

appID.title: Application Identifier
appID.description: Unique Identifier for the mobile application.

identiy.title: Identity associated with this token
identiy.description: The identity associated with this token before profile stitching. Deprecated due to typo, use xdm:identity instead.

identity.title: Identity associated with this token
identity.description: The identity associated with this token before profile stitching.
